title: Clean up debug print statements in dataset_manager.py
description: Replace 15+ print('[DEBUG]...') statements in platform/dataset_manager.py with proper Python logging module. Configure log levels (DEBUG, INFO, WARNING). Lines: 152-155, 165, 169-173, 180, 196, 209.

title: Implement direct whitematter inference in server_v2.py
description: TODO at line 399 in platform/server_v2.py says to implement direct inference with whitematter library instead of subprocess fallback. Use Python bindings to load model weights directly and call wm_model.predict() instead of spawning inference executable.

title: Add data validation for custom dataset uploads
description: Add: max file size limits (1GB), path traversal protection for ZIPs, validation of class count consistency, checks for corrupted image files, retry logic for MNIST IDX parsing.

title: Add missing API config endpoints
description: Frontend expects these endpoints but server returns 404: /config/optimizers, /config/schedulers, /config/augmentations, /config/layers, /design/help. Add GET endpoints returning available options (SGD, Adam, AdamW, RMSprop for optimizers; StepLR, CosineAnnealingLR for schedulers; Conv2d, Linear, LSTM etc for layers).

title: Expand test coverage for LSTM, GRU, MultiHeadAttention
description: Add comprehensive tests for: LSTM forward/backward with sequences, GRU operations, MultiHeadAttention with masking, attention gradients. Test variable sequence lengths, causal masking, gradient flow.

title: Expand test coverage for LSTM, GRU, MultiHeadAttention
description: Current tests cover basic layers but lack comprehensive tests for: LSTM forward/backward with sequences, GRU operations, MultiHeadAttention with masking, attention gradients. Add tests in tests/ directory for variable sequence lengths, causal masking, gradient flow through attention heads, GRU cell state propagation.

title: Add data validation for custom dataset uploads
description: dataset_manager.py lacks: max file size limits (could exhaust disk), path traversal protection (ZIP can contain ../ paths), validation of class count consistency, checks for corrupted image files. Add size limit (1GB), validate ZIP paths, scan for valid images, add retry logic for MNIST IDX parsing.
